website_summaries.verdict: Classic potato chips with limited, natural ingredients including organic potatoes make this pack of 15 5-ounce bags a good choice for those who love chips and also like to indulge in more healthful snacking.
pros: Nice potato flavor with just the right amount of crunch
Only 3 ingredients – organic potatoes, sea salt, and sunflower or safflower oil
You get 15 5-ounce bags for the price
cons: A few reports of bags that had close expiration dates

customer_reviews.title: Good Chips But...Read On
customer_reviews.text: This is a good brand of chips for the health conscious however couple of downsides. My first order was great so I ordered the second time. Halfway into the consumption after finishing about 6 bags noticed that the expiration dates had already passed by 4 months. So I checked the remaining 8 packets and they too were all expired over 4 months. Shocked and disappointed that Amazon could not check something so basic. My bad for being so trusting. Anyway checked local stores and found the same item in Who.....ds for 25 cents cheaper per bag. And expiration dates 6 months out. I guess I will be shopping there in future for this item.
customer_reviews.author: BE GOOD, DO GOOD

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love to eat junk food and exercise will the same time?
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy barbecue chips. One of the first things that I asked for when I got out of the hospital was for barbecue chips. Kettle brand taste good and you really can't tell the difference between it and the other stuff. One difference though is that your jaw gives a really good workout cuz the chips can take some effort to chew. That and your arms do to as it does take some efforts to get the bag open.
customer_reviews.author: Wally121

customer_reviews.title: Delicious organic chips
customer_reviews.text: I eat potato chips regularly, and I have heard that potatoes are in the "dirty dozen" vegetable list that should be bought organic. I don't know why more brands don't make them! Anyway, these also happen to be absolutely delicious. I eat them by the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza12

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect product description
customer_reviews.text: This product is listed as a pack of 15 (which is an amazing deal) when it is actually a single 5 oz bag. I only purchased this item because of the good deal. It is also listed as $0.03 per oz, another reason to believe it is 15 5oz bags when it is actually $0.45 per oz.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Capron

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I usually just buy one bag at a time at Whole Foods but since the store was stripped bare, I came up empty. My daughter loves these chips and not running out will make her feel more normal. I suspect this case of 15 will last for quite a while, maybe even until the apocalypse passes. Buying by the case is cheaper and more efficient anyway. Maybe I'll do it again in the future, even if the world comes back to life.
customer_reviews.author: EastMemphis

customer_reviews.title: A favorite at our house!
customer_reviews.text: These chips are a favorite at our house. We buy them by the case. 4.2 oz bags don't go far, but they are so tasty! We have bought several cases so far. Avocado oil is so healthy for you. Our #1 reason for buying. Used to buy at Whole Foods, but having them delivered is so much better! They arrive undamaged every time.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopaholic!

customer_reviews.title: Taste just like a Lays potato chips!
customer_reviews.text: I will say it very greasy...lol. When I took the bags out of there box you can see the oil seeped through the box it was delivered in!! Went straight through the bags!😲 It didn't have a crunchy bite unfortunately but wasn't stale, so not sure if its because of the avocado oil. But, it's avocado oil so it's better then alllll the other oils..besides 100% pure olive oil that is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Improves a boring sandwich
customer_reviews.text: A serving of these chips can spice up a boring sandwich lunch. The jalapeño flavor is pronounced but isn’t enough to overpower your taste buds. I also like using these as “crackers” to eat tuna salad and chicken salad, they're thick and stiff enough for that and add some nice flavor.
customer_reviews.author: LegoGirl

customer_reviews.title: mixed bag...
customer_reviews.text: "gentle kiss of salt" - not - they are quite salty in fact the dominant flavor is salt and it does not taste like the sea salt i buy and use in cooking also very inconsistent - some bags are very tasty others zero taste freshness and quality varies several phone calls and emails to kettle leads me to believe they have trouble sourcing organic potatoes so no doubt that is an issue and they are pricey
customer_reviews.author: vom357

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthier than regular chips!
customer_reviews.text: Love these things, and glad that I can get them on Amazon after my Publix stopped carrying them. They are cooked with avocado oil instead of the melange of unhealthy oils. This is now my go-to 'cheat!'
customer_reviews.author: R Armand

customer_reviews.title: A lot of good chips
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly my favorite potato chip and I know a lot of people don't believe that it being organic makes any difference but it isn't just the fact that it's organic but the fact that it is a already great potato chip brand that made it better. I just wish I could get them not in a pack of 15
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Dawley-Hill

customer_reviews.title: Amazon’s accuracy and quality is slipping.
customer_reviews.text: The organic chips are great. I just realized I got a whole box of regular chips after paying for organic. Now it’s too late to return them. Amazon has really been screwing up lately. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite of the Kettle Brand chips
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite of the Kettle Brand chips, as the Jalapeno flavor features an extremely delicious spicy taste that keeps you coming back for more. We first bought these at Walmart when they were on sale in a larger variety, but when I discovered that Amazon sold a smaller, 15-pack version which ended up costing way less per ounce I was sold. For me, the 5-ounce bags take two servings to satisfy, but that's plenty. I definitely recommend these for those who love spicy chips with the right mix of flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Middleton

customer_reviews.title: 2 bags received from different locations one fresh  ONE RANCID AND OVER SALTY
customer_reviews.text: ordered 2 bags, one bag was fresh with good flavor and usual salt level. THE SECOND BAG RECEIVED WAS RANCID OIL FLAORED, OVER SALTED AND SO GREASY THAT FINGERS were covered in grease after first two chips. YUK!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The real organic chips
customer_reviews.text: Perfect organic chips. Your taste buds will enjoy the taste of real organic chips, pepper and vinegar. I will definitely buy Kettle Brand products again.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjar

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Perfectly Greasy
customer_reviews.text: I can't stop with just one. Oh, wrong brand, but hey these things are hard to put down, a guilty pleasure for sure. The bag is made of titanium alloys or something though, so get some scissors - or you will be left without perfectly greasy BBQ goodness for longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Allred

customer_reviews.title: Its a go
customer_reviews.text: These is it chief. Himalayan hit different. Update: they are pretty greasy chips. Makes me feel better that its avocado oil but still, pretty greasy
customer_reviews.author: Harold C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Prime Delivers Perfect Chips - the PrimePackers know their stuff!
customer_reviews.text: We admit ordering these because we were curious how Amazon Prime would get them to us uncrushed (and in a box that also contained canned beverages no less!) First, they arrived perfectly fine, the Prime packers know what they are doing. Second, they are very tasty chips and we will order them again
customer_reviews.author: LandLockedSurferChick

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I ate so many bags of this stuff that I gained 5 pounds. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JF Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Spicy Thai 2.0
customer_reviews.text: ****These are essentially the Spicy Thai, Slightly different flavor, A little more heat and less sweet flavors, But otherwise they are identical to the Spicy
customer_reviews.author: Zachary McBurney

customer_reviews.title: Great Chips
customer_reviews.text: Can't find these by me so I was glad to find them online here and at a good price. Very good flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Hogan

customer_reviews.title: GREATDELICIOUSSHOULDBEALOTCHEAPER WHEN BUYING IN BULK-POSSIBLYEVEN BIGGERBAGS WHEN BUYING 15 OR MORE
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE REALLY GREAT, SHOULD BE CHEAPER 5 OUNCE BAG IS RIDICULOUSLY SMALL, EVEN TINY. BOUGHT A BULK BOX OF 15.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Terrell

customer_reviews.title: A certifieed organic chip that tastes even better than the non certified organic chips of the same ...
customer_reviews.text: A certifieed organic chip that tastes even better than the non certified organic chips of the same brand. You can feel good you are helping save the bees, butterfies and keeping our air, soil and water free from toxins and GMO's.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this one because every chip is soo flavorful.
customer_reviews.text: Super tasty and can be hard to find sometimes. Can be oily at the bottom of the bag, but I just put a paper towel in along the back/bottom ofbthe bag and problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Raena

customer_reviews.title: I wish these were still available in my area. Ordering them online is really expensive
customer_reviews.text: Great chips, my favorite flavor but not available locally anymore
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Nice flavor
customer_reviews.text: Love kettle chips, a little greasy but my favorite brand of chips.
customer_reviews.author: Jason McGarrity

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love these chips and can't buy them in any local stores. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unique flavors!
customer_reviews.text: These are so unique and refreshing! They taste especially yummy with a nice Mexicali dip too! Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Kettle Brand does no wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I like every flavor of this brand. Well, just not the sea salt and vinegar!
customer_reviews.author: wtj

customer_reviews.title: When one orders food,it's a gamble
customer_reviews.text: The chips have black edges on 40%., sometimes you eat the chip sometimes the chip eats you 🎃
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not arrive as described , can’t return. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Got about 35 bags of individual kiddie bags from the same brand, weren’t the right flavor or size. Some were soggy ?? Somehow ??
customer_reviews.author: Misty23

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE CHIPS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about these delicious potato chips! They are very salty and very peppery, but I like that. I also love that they're organic and have no added sulfites which cause me problems. BTW, dark chocolate goes very nicely with these chips LOL!
customer_reviews.author: LadyL

customer_reviews.title: ... can pronounce every one of them haha 👍🏻😋 I love these chips so crunchy and it’s a super nice ...
customer_reviews.text: Only 3 ingredients and you can pronounce every one of them haha 👍🏻😋 I love these chips so crunchy and it’s a super nice treat. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Good Chips but Too Salty
customer_reviews.text: Kettle chips are great, apart from one persistent problem. They are too salty. Every flavor I've tried has been over seasoned. These are just too salty. If you have a sensitive salt palate, you may want to try the unsalted variety.
customer_reviews.author: Chigley Wigley

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips but unfortunately about 6-8 bags came burst at the bottom and were stale. The rest were great though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Avocado oil
customer_reviews.text: The website sats avocado oil but the package says safflower or sunflower oil. I feel cheated.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H

customer_reviews.title: crushed
customer_reviews.text: Over half of package was completely crushed !!by I believe Froze solid cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Dake

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Avocado Oil Himalayan Salt Chips
customer_reviews.text: I loved these chips. I thought they tasted slightly less salty that Kettle's other chips. They do have a very slight mineral after taste to them but I actually liked that flavor. I will defiantly be purchasing these again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Boller

customer_reviews.title: No organic
customer_reviews.text: Love kettles chips, I ordered these by accident. Never again. Organic nasty taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oily tasting
customer_reviews.text: I did not like these at all. They were oily tasting and the seasoning not balanced. I will not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lou

customer_reviews.title: They are great.
customer_reviews.text: I like them because of the ingredients. The oil in it is good for you.
customer_reviews.author: Frits Brady

customer_reviews.title: Tiny bags
customer_reviews.text: Beware, these are small bags. I assumed since they were priced around the same amount per bag as what I get at the grocery store that they would be the same size. I was wrong. These are much smaller and therefore incredibly expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: jenna anderson

customer_reviews.title: Yumm
customer_reviews.text: I still miss the chipolte chili bbq chips Kettle used to make but these are good in their own right. If you have tried the chipolte ones you know how much spicy kick those had... these are more of a sweet, tangy bbq... probably trying to appeal to a broader audience... the only thing I would change is make the packaging smaller or increase the actual volume of chips in the bag (I prefer this idea)... be careful or you might eat the whole bag in one sitting. Semi-addictive.
customer_reviews.author: Qb

customer_reviews.title: Food deliveries
customer_reviews.text: I love kettle chips brands! Thank you so much they go with my sandwich it during lunch or with my dinner thank you respectfully, Kira Fisher💖💖💖💖💖💖💖
customer_reviews.author: Kira Fisher

customer_reviews.title: The Olive Oil baked chips on Amazon are much better.
customer_reviews.text: These are very greasy and salty if you're looking for a healthy snack. They leave your hands oily. I bought because have very few ingredients and organic. The Olive Oil baked chips on Amazon are much better.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like junk foods but you still need some snacks for kids. This one is tasty and it’s organic, kids love it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Aroma_mama

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive!!
customer_reviews.text: These potato chips taste great, however I’m only giving 2 stars because within one week the price increased by $15.00. YIKES! These are now unaffordable!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Polakowski

customer_reviews.title: My son and granddaughter love these chips they were there very favorite
customer_reviews.text: My son and granddaughter love these chips they were there very favorite !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fewer bags in box than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The chips are good. Have been purchasing them for years. HOWEVER, the last shipment was purchased as a pack of 15 bags. Instead, we received a total of 9 bags. That is a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: A reviewer from Bham, AL

customer_reviews.title: Great crunchy chips
customer_reviews.text: Best chips ever. Crunchy, not too salty. Bit oily sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Laborcita

customer_reviews.title: One of the healthier chips
customer_reviews.text: Simple, uncomplicated and healthy ingredients. Cooked in expeller pressed oils (not heated to extract, which causes loss of nutritional value), Kettle chips have a firmer texture than most others, but they have great flavor, even though no flavor enhancers are used except for the spices. No preservatives is also a plus. My only negative experience with them is an occasional bag in which the chips in the very bottom of the bag are oily. I was so pleased to find them at a price nearly a third less than what I have been paying in the grocery market.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know one of my favorite chips is available in organic!
customer_reviews.author: Will M.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I had expected and better than any other ...
customer_reviews.text: I am just freakin' hooked on these chips. Much better than I had expected and better than any other chip I have ever eaten.
customer_reviews.author: Hanan

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as tasty as "Good Health Avocado Oil" chips ...
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as tasty as "Good Health Avocado Oil" chips. I wanted to try for comparison but this flavor didn't compare.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like, the perfect complement for a Negroni!
customer_reviews.author: Stuff Lover

customer_reviews.title: a slight taste of jalapeno
customer_reviews.text: one of the best chips that you can buy...and i've tried all the kettle varieties, and many others. There's only a slight taste of jalapeno, and they are delicious. Perfect with a sandwich or alone. If you like being addicted, these are the chip for you. ...See you at addicts anonymous...
customer_reviews.author: Bruce77ch

customer_reviews.title: Too much pepper
customer_reviews.text: Pepper chinks were too big and there was too much pepper for my taste. :(
customer_reviews.author: Tijana milovanovic

customer_reviews.title: OM NOM NOM NOM!
customer_reviews.text: These chips are delicious. If you like salt & pepper flavored chips with a solid crunch, then you can't go wrong with these--they are the tastiest bag I've come across. The sea salt is easier on the palette than regular salt, in fact I have trouble cutting myself off mid-bag even though I normally enjoy a low sodium diet. I would feel like less of a lush if they had them in the 8-9oz bags.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Wang

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I really love Kettle Chips; these ones are especially wonderful. I can really taste a difference compared to the conventionally grown ones. I feel better about eating organic, knowing that I am avoiding harmful pesticides. The price here on Amazon is so much better than the price at the health food store. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S

customer_reviews.title: Good Taste and Healthier Choice
customer_reviews.text: The taste is nothing to worry about. They taste great. The high sodium and salt is what I worry about though. I might try something else that is lighter eventually. It came in the next day by UPS which an expiration of Feb 26 2008. Which means these are good for four months. I'm very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: A-Bomb

customer_reviews.title: Very yummy product
customer_reviews.text: Absolute yummy and scrummy.. I love Kettle Chips, such a beautiful flavor to them.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Woithe

customer_reviews.title: Best chips ever
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a chip person. But I regret every sandwich I have to eat without these.
customer_reviews.author: SF Bay Area Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good and tangy
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other review, these chips are not for a sore mouth or tender gums. The chips are very hard and the taste is delightful if you enjoy the salt/vinegar combo. Unfortunately, every bag I received in that case was over cooked! They were very dark and only a few golden brown chips in each bag. They definitely need to improve that!
customer_reviews.author: AJN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These chips are absolutely amazing. My husband loves them. They are resonably priced and are shipped and received extremely fast.
customer_reviews.author: Ash S.

customer_reviews.title: Good but too salty
customer_reviews.text: I love potato chips and since I have gone organic I've been missing one of my favorite snacks. Then I learned Kettle put out an organic chip so after I stopped jumping up and down with joy I bought them. On a scale of 1 to 10 I'd give them an 8. They are saltier than I like but absent any other choice, I'll take it.
customer_reviews.author: mona27

customer_reviews.title: Less expensive than our local market prices
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, but Yum!? These chips are excellent, very addicting and the best deal around. I got the box of them for my friends birthday; I think it was his favorite present!
customer_reviews.author: humboldt honey

customer_reviews.title: Good chips but few months past due date..
customer_reviews.text: Bought a case of these middle of December 2014. They were great. Ate a few bags, gave a few bags away. Didn't noticed until first week of January 2015 that all these had expiration date of September 2014! Amazon was quick to issue refund. After all, maybe it wasn't the pork from Christmas dinner that gave me stomach pain... Mixed feelings..
customer_reviews.author: C L C

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the plain organic Kettle chips. These were a bit too spicy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Mazur - Real Estate Coach

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Gluten Free Potato Chips
customer_reviews.text: I order 15 bags of these potato chips because I'm gluten sensitive, my family however eats them too. So I'm forced to order 15 bags of these chips every month. A famous tiger always said, "They're great."
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Joe, author of The Gospel According to Joe

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I personally through that the pepper was overpowering but it could be my tastebuds.
customer_reviews.author: Candice D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite chips, they are crunchy and a thicker chip, not too salty.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy B

customer_reviews.title: Nest chip ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the cost were the same as the super market and that the company still made this!
customer_reviews.author: MoJoCo

customer_reviews.title: yummy
customer_reviews.text: Love these chips, couldn't find them anywhere till after I received this case. Then found them at whole foods...more expensive, but who needs 12 bags of chips at once.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: These are the best chips ever. I order them by the case because you can't buy 5 oz in the store and it is just enough. I love them and have not bought any other chips since I have been buying these. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Pezak

customer_reviews.title: These are the best widely available bbq chips!
customer_reviews.text: thesedon't like hot food they might be a bit much for you. They have a great balance of sweetness and spice. Of course, Kettle Chips are just good chips - they use good oil to make them and even the plain ones are tasty. I also like that they are ridged chips - those are usually too crunchy and hard to chew for me - I don't want to have to work that hard for my deliciousness. If you like spicy barbecue you will definitely like these chips.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hulse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good. It doesn't have so much seasoning that it makes your mouth raw like some brands
customer_reviews.author: Mistro

customer_reviews.title: Really Good!
customer_reviews.text: Recently I began eating organic and to my surprise these chips are not lacking for taste! I give them a A+ flavorful, crunchy and just the right amount of salt.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Vakula

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmmmmmmm. Yum.
customer_reviews.text: Can't seem to find any other organic brands, so I can't make a comparison. But I can say that this is the only chip I've found that tastes like actual potatoes (hmmm, check the ingredients) and I don't feel sick after eating them, like those other brands I stopped buying years ago. Prolly why the few stores in my area that carry them are always running out.
customer_reviews.author: drdon88

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I like the lack of weird ingredients in Kettle products, but these chips are really greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Lee M-S

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are a good gluten free (& MSG free) barbecue potato chip.
customer_reviews.author: C. McCurdy

customer_reviews.title: Delicious organic alternative to regular GMO chips
customer_reviews.text: Delicious product! Although do not eat if you are on a Yeast free diet because they do have yeast extract in them :-(
customer_reviews.author: Kimberleigh Finnegan

customer_reviews.title: These are some of the better chips I've had
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the better chips I've had! If I'm going to eat chips, I love the fat coming from a good source. I can't taste any avocado flavor, just really good potato chips.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Mickelsen

customer_reviews.title: Great crispy chip!
customer_reviews.text: I have looked all over for an organic chip and these have the perfect blend of salt and crunch. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: D. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great  Snack
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY LOVE THESE, NOTHING BETTER. I GOT HOOKED THE FIRST TIME I TRIED THEM, HAVE GOT SMALLER BAGS, BUT LIKE THIS SIZE THE BEST." NOBODY MAKES A BETTER CHIP"
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Best

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Hard to find organic. These are awesome and not made with canola oil
customer_reviews.author: Deena N.

customer_reviews.title: Very different flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips. The flavor is not plain. They are sweet and spicy all at the same time. The only drawback is it has a tad bit too much salt. But, it still a great flavor!
customer_reviews.author: S. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Very good tasty chips
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty chips and I can eat these without getting a stomach ache like regular chips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite chips
customer_reviews.text: Only place to get these chips. Can't get them at Publix! So addicting ! Yum
customer_reviews.author: Laurath

customer_reviews.title: Kettle Organic Potato chips Sea salt and Balck Pepper.
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips, I ordered a case and finished them off, ready to order more. They are real crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: sandi Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent organic chips with no added mystery ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent chips, organic, and no extra garbage ingredients like so many other "organic" products will sneak in. We know chips are not a healthy snack, but in moderation we can indulge with these occasionally. I will definitely continue to purchase these in bulk. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Maria T

customer_reviews.title: if you can't live without chips, this is the one!
customer_reviews.text: absolutely the best potato chip ever so fresh, so bright a flavor.
customer_reviews.author: kate phillips

customer_reviews.title: Yipeeeee--an organic BBQ potato chip!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite chip. It is extremely hard to find organic BBQ chips. Actually, the Kettle brand is the only brand I've found so far. Once I found them, I immediately tried them. I eat a few a day so a bag doesn't last long. I just ordered a full carton from amazon.com so it is good to know I can always get these. The regular, sea salted Kettle chips are superior also but I had a big taste for BBQ chips since the grocery store brands have lots of nasty stuff in/on them and it had been years since I'd bought any BBQ. Try this brand, regular or BBQ. I think you'll be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyAboutBooks

customer_reviews.title: Yummy, crunchy goodness!
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find organic snacks in my town, so glad Amazon carries these, I buy a case on the subscribe and save plan, which makes them even cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Lagrand

customer_reviews.title: Not good value!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious chips however only less than half the bag is full. Not good value !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love that these are organic, and taste good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Autism Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really did them for their taste unfortunately they're very expensive just for 5 ounces
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: potato chips are excellent
customer_reviews.text: the chips are excellent, but quite expensive at $2 per package.
customer_reviews.author: pwdmommy3

customer_reviews.title: Very Oily
customer_reviews.text: The chips are OK. But very Oily. These chips have so much oil the entire inside of the bag is covered.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Organic yummy chips what more can you ask for
customer_reviews.text: These chips are a great snack if you don't want all the junk assiciated with chips. Try them you'll like them.
customer_reviews.author: mendomom

customer_reviews.title: love these chips
customer_reviews.text: the best chips ever. have always been a barbeque chip fan but these are the best. non organic can't compare and no pesticides.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Perry

product_meta.title: Kettle Brand Organic Potato Chips, Sea Salt, 5-Ounce Bags (Pack of 15)
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Organic Sea SaltWe searched high and low for undisputed organic potato excellence. Determined not to disrupt this flawless, spudsy goodness, we cook these beauties in small batches and sprinkle them with a gentle kiss of salt. Organic at its finest. The time and attention each Kettle Brand worker puts into our products, as each one makes its way from farms to our kitchens and then to your home, is care you can taste.
feature_bullets: Perfect organic potatoes hand cooked in small batches and coated with a gentle touch of salt
Only 3 simple ingredients: Organic potatoes, organic safflower and/or sunflower oil, sea salt
Made with natural ingredients; USDA Organic; Non GMO Project Verified
No trans fat or preservatives; kosher Parve; BPA free
Stock up with 15 bags of 5 ounce Organic Kettle Brand chips
